name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Field Engineer with 13+ years of experience in embedded systems and in-vehicle networking, specializing in **C/C++**, **AUTOSAR**, and communication protocols like **DDS** and **SOME/IP**. Proficient in **Python** and **Java**, with a solid understanding of SDLC and web services. Experienced in cloud-native architectures, utilizing **Containers** and deploying on cloud platforms such as **AWS** and **Azure**.
Skilled in networking technologies including **UDP**, **Multicast**, and **VLANs**, alongside a strong grasp of OSI layered networking. Effective in delivering technical presentations and communicating complex concepts clearly to stakeholders. Leveraging past expertise in **microservices** and **CI/CD pipelines**, I am adept at driving project success through innovative problem-solving and collaboration.
